from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - sum(c.values())

print(ans)

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)


from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i // 2

print(counter)

from collections import Counter 

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0 

for i in Counter(s).values(): 
    counter += i - 1 

print(counter)

n = int(input())
s = input()

ans = n - sum(s.count(c) for c in 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz')

print(ans)
